items.name: EveryStep
items.description: EveryStep provided amazing resources during our annual Iowa Remembers Retreat for military youth who have lost a loved one.

items.name: City Serve (Capitol City Church)
items.description: Capitol City Church assembled a volunteer team to support large-scale events like the Fall Family Festival and Cookies with Santa.

items.name: Pay It Forward Always
items.description: Pay It Forward Always enriched summer camp with a legacy-rock painting activity that strengthened community-building efforts.

items.name: USO Iowa
items.description: USO supplied creative craft kits and team-building materials that helped youth build connection, creativity, and fun.

items.name: Grand View Christian School
items.description: Grand View Christian School partners with CYP to provide facility space and support for youth programming.

items.name: Project Food and Fellowship (Iowa Select Farms)
items.description: Iowa Select Farms donated take-home activities and meals through Project Food and Fellowship to support military families in Iowa.

items.name: Jester Park Equestrian Center
items.description: Jester Park Equestrian Center hosted a free horseback riding camp for over 50 military youth, teaching grooming, saddling, and riding skills.

items.name: BGCA Mission Youth Outreach
items.description: Boys & Girls Clubs programming tailored to military-connected youth.
